issue.title: [Python] Add built wheel to manylinux1 dockerignore.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4584](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4584). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we add them to the docker context while we don't need them. This shrinks the context for me down to 55k instead of hundreds MiBs.
